description: Impose reduced RCP7.0 tropospheric ozone precursor emissions (not Methane).  Beginning in 2014 with air quality policies (or maximum feasible reductions) applied to the SSP3-70 tropospheric ozone precursor NTCF emissions.
name: RCP70ReducedTroposphericOzonePrecursorsNotMethane
longName: Reduced RCP7.0 Tropospheric ozone precursors but not methane
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, reduced tropospheric ozone precursors, not methane
